Name: Preakness Manhattan
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Sweet Manhattan with a herbal touch of Bénédictine and cognac. Drier and more complex than our Preakness Cocktail recipe.
History: A brandy-laced Sweet Manhattan with a herbal touch of Bénédictine . If you like this, you should also try a Preakness Cocktail recipe.
Nutrition: One serving of Preakness Manhattan contains 201 calories
